name: Pound Cake Cupcakes
author: BrandyA
summary: An easy, yummy, pound cake in cupcake form. I got this recipe out of a Southern Living magazine and modified it a little. Enjoy!
ingredients: ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat butter and cream cheese together until creamy; add sugar and beat until fluffy
Add eggs one at a time, beating until each one is blended
Combine flour, baking powder, and baking soda in a separate bowl
Gradually add to the butter mixture, alternating with sour cream, beating until blended
Spoon batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling each 2/3 full
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 20 to 24 minutes
